content: practice your half-double_crochet stitches with this super easy ribbed hat it features a tapered top that reduces bunching making it perfect with or without a pom this hat is perfect for beginners and is worked in half double crochets and slip stitches the pattern features 10 different sizes from preemie to adult large and includes instructions for how to make it slouchy or brimless the pattern features a photo and video tutorial it s also available for free on my blog https //www youshouldcraft com/beginner-ribbed-hat-crochet-pattern/ **materials ** 65 - 180 yards of brava worsted or your favorite worsted weight yarn - i used dove heather and marina j 6 0 mm crochet hook scissors tapestry needle tape measure optional pom this pattern is part of a 30-day series for new crocheters learn more here https //www youshouldcraft com/how-to-crochet-30-day-newbie-series/ **share your hats ** if you make a ribbed hat or 10 please share them with me on instagram use hashtags #yscnewbie and #youshouldcraft to be featured on the you should craft feed or stories **disclaimer ** you are welcome to sell items made using these patterns using your own images not mine but please provide credit and a link back to youshouldcraft com or my ravelry designer page permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing
